languages.text: "Вы слишком любезны ко мне, Лорд-капитан". {n}Девушка отводит взгляд, в котором проскальзывает странное выражение, кажется... радости?{/n} "Простите, наверное, я отвлекаю вас от важных дел. Позвольте на этом оставить вас, Лорд-капитан". {n}Кассия учтиво кивает и, взметнув подол плаща изящным движением, покидает комнату.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Вы слишком любезны ко мне, Лорд-капитан". {n}Девушка отводит взгляд, в котором проскальзывает странное выражение, кажется... радости?{/n} "Простите, наверное, я отвлекаю вас от важных дел. Позвольте на этом оставить вас, Лорд-капитан". {n}Кассия учтиво кивает и, взметнув подол плаща изящным движением, покидает комнату.{/n}

languages.text: "You are too kind, Lord Captain." {n}Cassia looks away, but before she does, you catch a strange fleeting expression on her face... Could it be joy?{/n} "I apologise. I must be distracting you from important matters. With this, please permit me to leave your presence, Lord Captain." {n}Cassia gives a courteous nod, gracefully picks up her cloak, and takes her leave.{/n}

Позвольте на этом оставить вас, Лорд-капитан". {n}Кассия учтиво кивает и, взметнув подол плаща изящным движением, покидает комнату.{/n}

With this, please permit me to leave your presence, Lord Captain." {n}Cassia gives a courteous nod, gracefully picks up her cloak, and takes her leave.{/n}

languages.text: “你过誉了，舰长大人。”{n}卡西娅别过脸，你看到她的脸上闪过某种转瞬即逝的异样表情……那是欣喜吗？{/n}“很抱歉，我一定耽误你处理正事了吧。请允许我就此告辞，舰长大人。”{n}卡西娅礼貌地点了点头，优雅地拾起一旁的斗篷，离开了书房。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are too kind, Lord Captain." {n}Cassia looks away, but before she does, you catch a strange fleeting expression on her face... Could it be joy?{/n} "I apologise. I must be distracting you from important matters. With this, please permit me to leave your presence, Lord Captain." {n}Cassia gives a courteous nod, gracefully picks up her cloak, and takes her leave.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你过誉了，舰长大人。”{n}卡西娅别过脸，你看到她的脸上闪过某种转瞬即逝的异样表情……那是欣喜吗？{/n}“很抱歉，我一定耽误你处理正事了吧。请允许我就此告辞，舰长大人。”{n}卡西娅礼貌地点了点头，优雅地拾起一旁的斗篷，离开了书房。{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr seid zu gütig, Lord Captain." {n}Cassia blickt fort, doch zuvor bemerkst du noch einen merkwürdigen Ausdruck über ihr Gesicht huschen ... Kann das Freude gewesen sein?{/n} "Ich bitte um Verzeihung. Ich halte Euch gewiss von wichtigen Angelegenheiten ab. Gestattet mir, mich aus Eurer Anwesenheit zu entfernen, Lord Captain." {n}Cassia nickt dir höflich zu, hebt anmutig ihren Mantel auf und verabschiedet sich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are too kind, Lord Captain." {n}Cassia looks away, but before she does, you catch a strange fleeting expression on her face... Could it be joy?{/n} "I apologise. I must be distracting you from important matters. With this, please permit me to leave your presence, Lord Captain." {n}Cassia gives a courteous nod, gracefully picks up her cloak, and takes her leave.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid zu gütig, Lord Captain." {n}Cassia blickt fort, doch zuvor bemerkst du noch einen merkwürdigen Ausdruck über ihr Gesicht huschen ... Kann das Freude gewesen sein?{/n} "Ich bitte um Verzeihung. Ich halte Euch gewiss von wichtigen Angelegenheiten ab. Gestattet mir, mich aus Eurer Anwesenheit zu entfernen, Lord Captain." {n}Cassia nickt dir höflich zu, hebt anmutig ihren Mantel auf und verabschiedet sich.{/n}

languages.text: « Vous êtes trop aimable, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Cassia détourne le regard, mais avant cela, vous avez le temps d'apercevoir une expression aussi fugace qu'étrange sur son visage... Serait-ce... de la joie ?{/n} « Je m'excuse. Je dois vous empêcher de vous pencher sur des affaires importantes. Sur ce, je vous prie de bien vouloir me permettre de prendre congé, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Cassia vous adresse un signe de tête courtois et prend gracieusement sa cape avant de s'en aller.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are too kind, Lord Captain." {n}Cassia looks away, but before she does, you catch a strange fleeting expression on her face... Could it be joy?{/n} "I apologise. I must be distracting you from important matters. With this, please permit me to leave your presence, Lord Captain." {n}Cassia gives a courteous nod, gracefully picks up her cloak, and takes her leave.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes trop aimable, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Cassia détourne le regard, mais avant cela, vous avez le temps d'apercevoir une expression aussi fugace qu'étrange sur son visage... Serait-ce... de la joie ?{/n} « Je m'excuse. Je dois vous empêcher de vous pencher sur des affaires importantes. Sur ce, je vous prie de bien vouloir me permettre de prendre congé, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Cassia vous adresse un signe de tête courtois et prend gracieusement sa cape avant de s'en aller.{/n}

languages.text: «Es usted muy amable, Lord Capitán». {n}Cassia aparta la mirada, pero antes de que lo haga, captas una expresión fugaz en su rostro... ¿Podría ser alegría?{/n} «Le pido disculpas. Debo estar distrayéndole de asuntos importantes. Permítame abandonar su presencia, Lord Capitán». {n}Cassia asiente cortésmente, recoge con elegancia su capa y se marcha.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are too kind, Lord Captain." {n}Cassia looks away, but before she does, you catch a strange fleeting expression on her face... Could it be joy?{/n} "I apologise. I must be distracting you from important matters. With this, please permit me to leave your presence, Lord Captain." {n}Cassia gives a courteous nod, gracefully picks up her cloak, and takes her leave.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Es usted muy amable, Lord Capitán». {n}Cassia aparta la mirada, pero antes de que lo haga, captas una expresión fugaz en su rostro... ¿Podría ser alegría?{/n} «Le pido disculpas. Debo estar distrayéndole de asuntos importantes. Permítame abandonar su presencia, Lord Capitán». {n}Cassia asiente cortésmente, recoge con elegancia su capa y se marcha.{/n}

languages.text: 「あなたは親切すぎます、ロード・キャプテン」{n}カシアは視線を外したが、あなたはその前に、彼女に奇妙な表情がつかのま浮かぶのを見る…。喜びだろうか？{/n}「申し訳ありません。あたくしは重要な任務を担う邪魔をしていますね。ではこれで失礼します、ロード・キャプテン」{n}カシアは礼儀正しく会釈すると、優雅にマントを手にして立ち去る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are too kind, Lord Captain." {n}Cassia looks away, but before she does, you catch a strange fleeting expression on her face... Could it be joy?{/n} "I apologise. I must be distracting you from important matters. With this, please permit me to leave your presence, Lord Captain." {n}Cassia gives a courteous nod, gracefully picks up her cloak, and takes her leave.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは親切すぎます、ロード・キャプテン」{n}カシアは視線を外したが、あなたはその前に、彼女に奇妙な表情がつかのま浮かぶのを見る…。喜びだろうか？{/n}「申し訳ありません。あたくしは重要な任務を担う邪魔をしていますね。ではこれで失礼します、ロード・キャプテン」{n}カシアは礼儀正しく会釈すると、優雅にマントを手にして立ち去る。{/n}

languages.text: "Çok naziksin Lord Kaptan." {n}Cassia başını çevirse de öncesinde yüzünde beliren değişik ifade, gözünden kaçmıyor... Hoşuna gitmiş olabilir mi?{/n} "Özür diliyorum. Seni de mühim işlerinden alıkoydum. Müsaadenle huzurundan ayrılıyorum Lord Kaptan." {n}Cassia, başını nezaketle eğiyor ve pelerinini zarifçe toplayıp gidiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You are too kind, Lord Captain." {n}Cassia looks away, but before she does, you catch a strange fleeting expression on her face... Could it be joy?{/n} "I apologise. I must be distracting you from important matters. With this, please permit me to leave your presence, Lord Captain." {n}Cassia gives a courteous nod, gracefully picks up her cloak, and takes her leave.{/n}
